QuestData.Title: An Eight-Legged Curse
QuestData.Description:
Some terrible old hag unleashed a swarm of these horrible spiders in the mine! I was barely able to make it out alive, but they've got me surrounded!
You can't leave me here! Please kill those things!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Bilefang spiders in the Bleak Hills Mine.
QuestData.RewardText:
You... killed them!?
Oh thank you so much! It's been like a living nightmare in here!
